oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Milk from forage on organic dairy farms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leach, Katharine
Feur, Gaelle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
Feeding and growth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Milk from forage (MFF) has been used as an indicator of dairy enterprise performance since the 1970s. There is considerable evidence associating MFF with good economic performance. ORC researcher Katharine Leach and intern GaÃ«lle Feur have been looking at the MFF performance of some organic dairy farms as part of the SOLID project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leach, Katharine and Feur, Gaelle (2013) Milk from forage on organic dairy farms. ORC , July 2013, 112, pp. 10-11.
